scan_metadata.description: elasticbeanstalk - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CloudWatch logging
check_functions.description: Checks if CloudWatch logging is enabled for environment

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check enhanced health reporting
check_functions.description: Checks if enhanced health reporting is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check managed updates
check_functions.description: Checks if managed updates are enabled for environment

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check managed platform updates
check_functions.description: Checks if managed platform updates are configured

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check environment logs to S3
check_functions.description: Checks if environment logs are sent to S3
